name: Push Pussy
description:
Meow. 

This is my table. Why is it packed with so many  junk? It needs some cleaning.

Play as a very angry and mischievous orange cat  in their mission to push as many object they can down the table they're sitting on before the time runs  out.

If you're fast and skilled enough in your acts of pure spitefulness, you can get purr-fect combo and objects that extend your timer.

But be careful: some may be sharp, some may be pointy and can hurt you!

Good luck... Meow.

Featuring:

  • Colorful and cartoonish artstyle
  • Plenty of objects to push down
  • A fast-paced experience
  • A tutorial to make you extra-mischievous

Credits:

  • Fabrizio Marongiu- Programming
  • Amaryllis (Irene) Cancellara- 2D Art, UI/UX Artist (LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter)
